review: This is much more reliable and faster than the Roku stick that it replaced!

review: Product hooked up easy.  The problem is that I guess our internet is not fast enough so I wasn't able to watch anything on it.  It just kept searching for a signal.  So, I can't tell anyone how well it works.

review: Delivery was fast . My  daughter  loves in college

review: Easy to work with  and the value is great

review: Easy to use. A little more than I expected as far as menu options. Blows away my Apple TV.
